title: Chicken Tikka Kebabs
ingredients: ['150ml low-fat natural yoghurt', '3 tablespoons tikka curry paste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '4 chicken breasts, cut into cubes', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', 'pitta breads to serve', 'lettuce', '2 tomatoes, diced', '1 raw onion, sliced', '150ml soured cream']
